subject: Boxing
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Lewis was a former used-car salesman best known for getting Michael Spinks a $13.5 million payday for what became 91 seconds in the ring with Mike Tyson.
snippet: Mr. Lewis was a former used-car salesman best known for getting Michael Spinks a $13.5 million payday for what became 91 seconds in the ring with Mike Tyson.
